Title: Directs the discontinuance of the Yonkers toll plaza on the New York state thruway
Summary: Directs the New York state thruway authority to discontinue and remove the Yonkers toll plaza on the New York state thruway.
LawCode: Add ยง360-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to discontinuing the Yonkers toll plaza on the New York state thruway
